string.value: Once the Baby Robot has been nurtured to reach level 15, I better take it to Garnox, who specializes in nurturing evolving pets.

Robots, a beautiful product of a perfect blend of technology and magic, can apparently transform into a more mature being. The process just needs requires some materials to work with. I'll need to get #b1 #t5380000##k and #b50 #t4000111#s#k and bring them to Garnox.
What used to be a small robot pet has grown up and became an Adult Robot.

This... is one interesting organism. A magical life blended with a power of science... the evolution of life has become that much more advanced now. Okay, so what brought you here...? Do you want to grow this Robot.. I mean, this living pet?
Okay... but I can't just sit back and watch it grow. Unlike other pets that were created purely with magic, this pet is a bit different. I'll need the #t5380000# and 50 Cheap Batteries for that.
Take your time gathering up those materials. I'll be here studying more alchemy-related formulas.
Do you want it stay in that form? Then there's nothing I can do...
Did you bring all the materials?
